entry.title: 3M 5857 - Dent Finishing Glaze 0 9.3 Fl. Oz. (276 ml) 7000120077
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Glazes
Price: 45.00

[shortdesc]

3M Dent Finishing Glaze, 05857, 9.3 fl. oz. (276 ml)

  • 3M Dent Finishing Glaze is a two-component, self-leveling glaze designed for use as a Inchskin Inch coat over sheet metal, and dent repair compound to fill pinholes, sand scratches, low areas, gouges and other imperfections
  • It may be applied on properly prepared polyester body filler, steel, aluminum, sheet molded compound (SMC), fibreglass reinforced polyester (FRP), and cured automotive paint surfaces
  • Intended to be used as an auto body repair material, 3M Dent Finishing Glaze may also be used for industrial and architectural surfaces needing minor surface repairs.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Application Small Dent Repair
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Glazes
    Volume 9.3 oz

    Product Information

  • Great adhesion
  • Self-levelling
  • Two-component glaze

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to repair minor imperfections such as scratches, gouges, pinholes, and low areas
  • May also be used for industrial and architectural surfaces needing minor surface repairs
    		•

entry.title: 3M 8509 - Auto Bedding & Glazing Compound 0 Black 10 Fl. Oz. (295.7 ml) 7000000947
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Glazes
Price: 14.68

[shortdesc]

3M Auto Bedding and Glazing Compound, 08509, black, 10 fl. oz. (295.7 ml)

  • 3M™ Auto Bedding and Glazing Compound is a non-hardening, pliable, water-resistant, medium-bodied sealer for sealing auto seams
  • Can be used as a supplementary sealer for auto glass installation between windshield rubber and car body
  • This compound remains permanently soft, and has a non-sag consistency for vertical and overhead applications
  • It wipes off with a dry rag for easy clean up
  • Designed for use with the 3M™ Professional Caulking Gun, 08993.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Color Black
    Origin Country United States

  • Has non-sag consistency for vertical and overhead applications
  • Cleans up with dry rag.

  • Pliable and water-resistant

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Glazes
Price: 38.93

[shortdesc]

3M Flowable Finishing Glaze, 05824, red, 24 fl. oz. (710 ml)

  • 3M™ Flowable Finishing Glaze is a two-component, stain-free, tack-free, self-leveling repair putty designed for use as a skin coat over plastic filler to fill pinholes, sand scratches, low areas or other imperfections
  • This glaze works well on galvanized, aluminum and thoroughly cured and sanded factory-applied paint surfaces
  • It minimizes staining that can occur with basecoat/clear coat systems over body filler
  • This flowable, brushable product cures tack-free in 30 minutes
  • Designed for use with 3M™ Creme Hardener, 05829, 05830, or 05831.
